articles.author: Pia Singh
articles.title: Stock futures rise after major averages tumble in tech sector sell-off: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Major stock indexes sank on Wednesday, led by a significant decline in technology stocks and mounting tariff worries.
articles.content:
Stock futures rose modestly Wednesday night after a steep sell-off in the prior session.
Futures tied to the Dow Jones Industrial Average added 62 points, or 0.15%. S&P 500 futures advanced 0.2%… [+2423 chars]
